document.discussion_title: VIDEO: Sinn Féin's 'high five' under threat?
document.topic_text: Media playback is unsupported on your device NI Assembly election: Sinn Féin's 'high five' under threat in West Belfast? 25 April 2016 Last updated at 17:01 BST Can Sinn Féin retain its five seats in the West Belfast constituency in next month's Northern Ireland Assembly election? The party is seeking to achieve that feat for the third straight assembly election, but under pressure from People Before Profit's Gerry Carroll. Gareth Gordon reports.
